<MethodEndpoint

>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



This endpoint allows you to create a new scalartax Accounts.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"company_name":{"type":"string","description":"The name of the company","example":"scalarhub"},"name":{"type":"string","description":"The name associated with the user","example":"pro"},"username":{"type":"string","description":"The username for the account","example":"chauhanmanoj16358@gmail.com"},"first_name":{"type":"string","description":"The first name of the user","example":"Manoj"},"last_name":{"type":"string","description":"The last name of the user","example":"Chauhan"},"email":{"type":"string","format":"email","description":"The email address of the user","example":"chauhanmanoj16358@gmail.com"},"billing_cycle":{"type":"string","description":"The billing cycle for the account (e.g., monthly, yearly)","example":"monthly"},"account_status":{"type":"string","description":"The status of the account (e.g., Active, Inactive)","example":"Active"}},"required":["company_name","name","username","first_name","last_name","email","billing_cycle","account_status"],"xml":"Account","title":"Account"}}},"description":"Created Account object","required":true}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

subscription","example":"SUB20241223161030c3c43defc53747f"},"plan_id":{"type":"string","description":"Unique identifier for the plan associated with the subscription","example":"USR20241223161030a0122295da864e1"},"status":{"type":"string","enum":["ACTIVE","INACTIVE","CANCELED"],"description":"Current status of the subscription","example":"ACTIVE"},"created_at":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","description":"Date and time when the subscription was created"},"updated_at":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","description":"Date and time when the subscription was last Request"},"422":{"description":"Unprocessable Entity.
